Package dndcompanion.character

Class DndChar

java.lang.Object
dndcompanion.character.DndChar
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class DndChar
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Class for the storing of character data from GUI.
Author:
Sam Webb, Nick Ford
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • DndChar

      public DndChar()

    • DndChar

      public DndChar​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String alignment, Race race, CharacterClass charClass, int level, int exp, int[] stats, java.lang.String skills, java.lang.String background, java.lang.String traits, java.lang.String ideals, java.lang.String bonds, java.lang.String flaws, int armor, int maxHp, java.lang.String features, java.lang.String profs, java.lang.String equipment, java.lang.String player)
      Constructor that takes all character data as parameters. Used in saving character objects.
      Parameters:
      name - Character Name
      alignment - Two character String of [L, N, or C] + [G, N, or E].
      race - Object represents the race of the character.
      charClass - Object represents the class of the character.
      level - Character level.
      exp - Character experience points.
      stats - Array of the character's stats.
      skills - String containing the name of all skills the character is proficient in.
      background - Character background.
      traits - Character personality traits text.
      ideals - Character ideals text.
      bonds - Character bonds text.
      flaws - Character flaws text.
      armor - Character armor class.
      maxHp - Character maximum Health Points.
      features - Character features and racial traits text.
      profs - Character proficiencies (Ex: languages, weapon types, etc.).
      equipment - Character equipment text.
      player - Name of person who plays the character.
